title: Get a data policy
description: Gets a specific data policy from the BigQuery Data Policy API by its resource name. This is useful for checking the configuration of a policy.

objective.narrative: This sample solves the developer problem of needing to inspect a specific data policy. A common use case is programmatically verifying that a data masking rule is correctly applied to a BigQuery table before running a sensitive analytics job.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2beta1_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_get
regionTags.title: Get a data policy
